entry.title: Network Security
entry.summary:
Seed network security
Basic
Basic Network Utilities
Wireshark, ping, netcat, telnet, ssh, iptables, ip addr, ip route, dig
classful addressing
A: 0.0.0.0 - 127.255.255.255, 0… , /8 B: 128.0.0.0 - 191.255.255.255, 10… , /16 C: 192.0.0.0 - 223.255.255.255, 110… , /24 D: 224.0.0.0 - 239.255.255.255, 1110… , multicast E: 240.0.0.0 - 255.255.255.255, ...
